text: Loving this new church hub in Taman Jurong. NEW LIFE BAPTIST Church services are in English and Mandarin at 10 am on Sundays.

Most of the original members from Ebenezer chapel have already left, including the first pastor.
The original building fund that was contributed for a church building was used to buy an office building at Kampong Bahru, without AGM approval.
The results is the church renting premises for many years.

The current church does not sing any Baptist hymns like Onward Christian soldiers or Be thou my vision. It incorporates many church growth tactics, like singing hyped pop Christian songs, Alpha courses, family gatherings, and a pastor NOT from Baptist background.

Was the first church in Acts of the Apostles a Baptist church? Will you find any peace attending NLBC activities?

This church has a urban farming club for Taman Jurong residents. They are also giving away 3 tonnes of top soil. If you need soil for your gardening, farming etc come on sat between 10am to 12pm with your pails. Take as much as you want

Great Baptist Church in Singapore established to glorify the Lord Jesus Christ.   Warm congregation!  Great opportunities to learn, grow and serve with a heart to bless our communities.  Love worshipping here!
